name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A strange scene occurred in the comment section under a video of "Putin appeared at the Russian campaign headquarters": more than 10,000 netizens posted the word "history" with emojis of covering their faces with tears and laughter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Nanyang, Henan, urban auxiliary police stopped paying overtime pay for 23 years
Last year, when the provincial supervision team came to inspect, the leaders maintained stability in the group and said that they would pay after statistics. On January 11, someone asked on the mayor's message board when it would be paid. On January 17, the Public Security Bureau replied that overtime allowances would be stopped.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 18, Tiedong Village, Tiechang Town, Longchuan County, Heyuan City, Guangdong Province, issued an incentive measure for "matchmakers", which provides a 600 yuan introduction fee reward to matchmakers who introduce spouses to young men in the village and eventually register for marriage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many netizens complained that the price was too low, and that the matchmaker fees in their hometowns were much higher.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 19, merchants from Taihang Logistics came to the building opposite the Zhengzhou Petition Bureau and hung banners and jumped off the building to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 19, North Korea conducted a test of an underwater nuclear weapons system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Freedom·Love"
On January 19, Henan retail giant Pang Donglai announced that all stores would be closed for five days during the Spring Festival, and put up the slogan "Freedom·Love".
This triggered unanimous praise and envy from netizens.
For a long time, Pang Donglai has been known as "the best store in China" for its good service attitude and good employee benefits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contributions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 19, the official response stated: The vehicle that was fined was a dump truck that leaked mud and rocks along the way. It was reported by the public and was fined the maximum amount.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens joked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Post-00s are once again rectifying the workplace 
Recently, it was reported online that a girl from the Wenzhou Red Cross Society angrily criticized the provincial department leader
It is said that because she was scolded by the leader as "brainless" when she was distributing materials, she called but was rejected, so she immediately sent a series of voice messages on Zhejiang Zhengding to directly criticize the other party and teach him how to speak properly
"If there is a problem, just say it... I give you face... What level are you?
I don't know who spoiled you, you are so old and have no manners at all"
Currently, the video has been deleted from the entire network

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many netizens said they were happy to hear this. The girl said her boss asked her to delete the video but she refused, saying "I am a non-staff member but I am the boss" and "I just gave them face." However, the video has been deleted from the entire network and all videos on the girl's account have been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Strange things keep happening. On January 19, the media reported that a villager in Wuqing, Tianjin was fined 200 yuan for saying three sentences in the village committee WeChat group. The reason is that according to the village rules and regulations, speaking in the village committee WeChat group will be fined.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up to the collective report by 11 current students of Huazhong Agricultural University
On January 18, Huazhong Agricultural University issued a situation report
From now on, Huang Feiruo will be suspended from all positions and work on campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 18, Nanning, Guangxi. Longguang Group owed workers wages, so workers sat on the edge of the building roof and jumped off the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 19, Luncang Town, Quanzhou City, Fujian Province.
The local government sent a large number of unidentified personnel wearing camouflage uniforms, equipped with helmets and shields to carry out forced demolition. During the period, a conflict broke out between the owner and the demolition personnel, and one owner was pushed to the ground during the dispute.
The video shooter said that the government called more than 100 gangsters to carry out forced demolition, saying that 120 was outside, and 120 people were beaten to death, knowingly breaking the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 19, Jinan, Shandong. Fosun International Center owes workers wages for 2021-2022, and has not yet paid them.
The helpless workers can only sleep outside the company to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 19, in Nanle County, Puyang City, Henan Province, Xinyicheng sold shops to owners on a leaseback basis. On January 1, 2024, the rent had expired but the developer had not yet returned the rent to the owners. A large number of owners gathered outside the mall and held banners to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"If I can't cure People's Daily, I can't cure you either"
The incident of male and female Daji in Yuntaishan Scenic Area continues to ferment. "Jimu News" once published a commentary on this matter, saying that the performance of "male and female Daji" was presented in a way that was somewhat "nightclub-style". This kind of cultural tourism marketing focused on marketing male and female eroticism, which actually did not help the scenic area much. People who came for this kind of interaction did not have much time to see the beautiful scenery.
The commentary article caused dissatisfaction among many netizens. Netizens believed that Jimu News had commented on the incident of a girl wearing anime costumes and being stopped by security inspectors on the subway. Public management should not be too broad, but criticized the recent "male and female Daji" incident in Henan. Netizens accused Jimu News of double standards and deliberately provoking confrontation.
Subsequently, a large number of dissatisfied netizens began to "defeat magic with magic". First, they questioned that the LOGO of "Jimu News" was suspected to be the Japanese flag. The name "Jimu" contained Japanese elements, and even "Japan" was "Mo" if the horizontal line of the word "Mu" was split to the side of the word "Mu". Moreover, netizens found that they could not find any news about "nuclear waste water" in Jimu News, which further confirmed the netizens' "speculation".
As of the time of writing, due to too many netizens flocking to the live broadcast room and comment section to "catch spies", Jimu News has closed the comment function of videos and live broadcasts, and the items in its product display window have also been removed from the shelves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Jimu News has been called "Ji Ri" News by netizens.
